item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

2. Web Browser Engineering (387 points | 58 comments)
3. Show HN: Pumpkin – A Modern Minecraft server written in Rust (103 points | 22 comments)

11. Commonly used arm positions can overestimate blood pressure readings: study (291 points | 199 comments)
12. Turn your Android phone into a modern ham radio transceiver (446 points | 163 comments)

14. Drawing Graphics on Apple Vision with the Metal Rendering API (87 points | 53 comments)

26. Furilabs Linux Phone (153 points | 188 comments)
27. Google commits to buying power generated by nuclear-energy startup Kairos Power (535 points | 414 comments)
28. Routine dental X-rays are not backed by evidence (255 points | 263 comments)
29. Can a biologist fix a radio? What I learned while studying apoptosis (2002) [pdf] (68 points | 24 comments)
30. Scale Ruins Everything (129 points | 161 comments)
